website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quirks you might expect for the low price, this attractive quilt set is worth considering if budget is your top concern.
pros: Made of soft, machine-washable microfiber with a stitch pattern that gives it a stylish appearance
Comes in several colors and popular sizes
cons: Not as durable as pricier options, and the material is on the thin side
Some of the colors look different in person than online

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quilt & shams!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write as many reviews as I should but this quilt set is exceptional for the price. I ordered Basketweave Gray--it is soft, a very pretty silver green gray with a generous over hang for a queen bed and it comes with 2 very nice regular size shams. I repainted a bedroom "Mindful Gray" by Sherwin Williams and this quilt looks absolutely beautiful with this paint color. Definately worth more than $36.99. One of my best amazon purchases ever...
customer_reviews.author: Nan C

customer_reviews.title: So in love!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this quilt set. I ordered the grey basket weave pattern and it is so beautiful! The stitching was perfect. It's not too heavy and not too light weight. Will purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: and is quite comfortable enough during a mild winter night
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, soft material. We added a soft liner blanket underneath it, and is quite comfortable enough during a mild winter night. I bought the navy blue which is a deep muted navy color. Purchased the king size for our queen size bed with understorage drawers, so it fits great. Well made aside from some very minor stitching mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive, lightweight, and soft comforter for our office/guest room/multi-use room and this was a perfect choice for what I needed. I didn’t want to spend a lot of money either. This was a great value and I love how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and perfect for hot summer nights
customer_reviews.text: I have a king size bed and I have a hard time finding the right blanket for it. The blankets are either too heavy or not wide enough. This quilt is perfect. I live in a desert area and this quilt is light enough to sleep under during the summer. I would like the blanket to be just a bit wider only because I snuggle in my blankets and my husband and I end up play tug-o-war at night. I don't see us having that problem with this quilt. I would definitely recommend this quilt and purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A Yount

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure what to expect with this because of the price. We have been using a big fluffy down comforter for the last 3 years and now that I’m pregnant it’s just too hot, so we decided to try this lightweight quilt. We both loooove it. I’m never too warm or too cool. I also love that the bed is easier to make now and it doesn’t get as messy overnight. The only thing I would change is the width- if it were about a foot wider I’d be able to tuck it into the platform bed on either side but it’s just too short.
customer_reviews.author: CMI

customer_reviews.title: The sham is incomplete. Does not match other sham
customer_reviews.text: the comforter and shams are nice material, nice pattern and soft. Lightweight which I wanted. However, the shams are not the same. Not the same size. One has the outside flap the other does not. So they are mismatched. One does not have the extra inch or two of material around the outside of the sham. So could not give this any more than 3 stars. The sham is incomplete. I am revising my earlier review. CUSTOMER SERVICE is SUPER. Bedsure offered to send a replacement for the incomplete shams I originally received. They didn't have to, but they did. The replacement is just as soft and pretty as the original except both shams are the same. Thank you, Bedsure!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dark gray bamboo fabric bedspread
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dark gray bamboo fabric bedspreadI absolutely absolutely adore this comforter. The color the feel the weight all beautiful. I recently bought the curtains in this photo the bedspread and some things for the bathroom and have been pleased with everything. I am hooked on the bamboo products and I also bought a set of new sheets what you can’t see in this photo and love those as well you will not be disappointed they are a great value
customer_reviews.author: Burger Lover - Dalton

customer_reviews.title: NICE DESIGN&DARK NAVY BLUE
customer_reviews.text: The 'Basketweave Pattern' is nice & think it would probably really display it's attractiveness in a lighter color.However, I chose the Navy due to our lifestyle & bedroom color.(closest to a true navy blue I've seen). As described it is "lightweight,'which is good for us as our room tends to stay warm @ night,& we do not like heavy covers. I selected the King size for our Queen size bed,& I still need to purchase a bedskirt to 'hide' the bedframe legs & under- bed stored items.(We have a pillowtop 13" mattress). "Value for money:I give it a 3 Star,as I think it is somewhat overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: LCBarb

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad buy- but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I used this quilt underneath my duvet comforter because living in Florida- it’s usually too hot to use the duvet and we like to sleep with a quilt instead! Honestly- I kinda feel like the quilt looks like a moving blanket. It’s not very cute.. and it’s nothing special. I also wish it was a little softer.. BUT- for what I’m using it for, it’s perfectly fine. It looks cute enough with the duvet covering most of it & it’s lightweight enough to use as a blanket but definitely still keeps us warm here in the south! It’s not a bad buy.
customer_reviews.author: Presley

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered Bedsure spreads before and have been very pleased. They hold up well to frequent washings. We have cats and I wash the bed spread approximately every two weeks. I wanted to get rid of the bed skirt but also wanted the bedspread to reach the floor. We have a queen size bed so I decided to try the king size spread. It's perfect! It's long enough for both sides to read the floor. When ordering a queen spread, I usually need a bed skirt to have coverage to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't big enough for our king bed. And ...
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't big enough for our king bed. And it was thin and looked cheap. You get what you paid for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: better for a full, not a queen
customer_reviews.text: have a queen bed, this fits a full better, hence the full/queen in the description... if you have a queen bed, you might want something specific for a queen.... as the one I received does not cover the mattress completely... there is about an inch to inch/half short on both sides... however, it is long enough... just a little to short to cover the mattress completely.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: lightweight but great for a little bit more warmth
customer_reviews.text: Love this quilt set. Have Navy set very lightweight but great for a little bit more warmth than just a sheet alone, I place it with a flannel sheet and it as warm as could be just perfect. It's a perfect It seems to be very well made for how inexpensive it is priced. It is just what I was looking for I highly recommend this set over others that have a "fake embossed" quilt design, because this one is actually stitched. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Michele Mariie

customer_reviews.title: NOT for California King bed
customer_reviews.text: Quilt is extra light - I did not expect it to be thick since everybody commented that it is very thin, still, I was surprised HOW thin. I ordered ivory color with basket-wave stitching and color is very nice "off white", not yellowish. My biggest complaint is that this quilt can not cover California king bed, not even close !!! Luckily I did not buy it for that purpose, wanted to cover 2/3 of a bed and keep my decorative pillows exposed, otherwise it would be useless !!!
customer_reviews.author: nv

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My Mother is 87 years old and is very set in her ways. She has always liked only the quilted comforters and is very partial to pale pink color. Her old one was starting to show wear and I searched everywhere before I found this one. She loves it! It's the exact color and very soft and lightweight. I plan on purchasing another one to have as a backup. Price was right, too!
customer_reviews.author: hockeypuck

customer_reviews.title: Advertisement is false
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! First Amazon order I am highly unsatisfied. The fact that it is descriptive as "Black" when it is actually charcoal gray, or definitely faded. Order at your own risk. I will be contacting the seller on this false advertisement. Let's hope customer service is better than this product. $50.... completely frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Tierra Hines

customer_reviews.title: Great product....
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. Delivered well, smelled and looked new but color wasn’t quite what I was expecting. But, nothing was wrong with the product. However, I contacted customer service and they were more than helpful, quick to reply and took care of everything quickly.
customer_reviews.author: E's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!! A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I HIGHLY recommend this quilted set. Very soft, super lightweight. I hate a poofy bed and this makes the bed look sleek and flat in the best way possible. My only thing is BUY A SIZE UP. I have a king and when I washed the comforter it shrunk significantly (to my standards) I should have ordered a calking. But I plan on reordering this quilt again and again!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Tatro

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: This bedspread looks really nice and the price is great. I have two dogs who always end up on the bed and this bedspread is great. I can wash the spread easily in my washer and it keeps holding its form. The basket weave pattern really makes this bedspread look more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love it... but..,
customer_reviews.text: Updated: I removed 1 Star. Despite washing on cold and the gentle cycle, drying on gentle it shrunk quite a bit :(. Now it doesn’t cover the side of my bed like it did. The width is too short. This is incredible value for the money. The quilt is light weight, easy to wash and adds beauty to any bed set. I have this under my duvet. I might purchase the gray one next time.
customer_reviews.author: NFORT

customer_reviews.title: Not peach, more medium rose, but lightweight and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed that this was so light in weight that with a sheet, perfect under a ceiling fan in summer. Stitching was through and through and washed well in cold water in my front loader. Dried well. Would have preferred some peach tinge though.
customer_reviews.author: atlantanana

customer_reviews.title: I don't sweat under it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was sweating under my other blanket's at night but I get too cold to just use a sheet. This has been perfect so far! The only thing I can say negative about it is I just wish it were more soft.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Carter

customer_reviews.title: NICE cover for my bed
customer_reviews.text: I have a king size bed and live in Arizona where it's very hot in the summer and gets cold at night in the winter. So far this blanket seems to have the right weight and warmth to make it comfortable at any temperature. I would consider buying another one for my other bedrooms since the price and quality is so nice.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: It's very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my king size bed perfectly. It hangs over the sides too. The fur from my 2 mastiffs doesn't cling to it which is fantastic. Washes very easilly. It fits fine in my top load washing machine and in my front load dryer. It is also soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend - especially for pet parents
customer_reviews.text: I had been struggling finding a comforter that was soft, not too hot, fit our bed, durable, washable, and affordable (we have 3 large dogs who sleep in bed - so it's a must!) I've bought/gone through 3 different comforters in less than 6 months because other products didn't meet all of my criteria but this product has been the best purchase and surpassed my expectations! It's holding up well, comfortable, and is so easy to wash! If we need another comforter, I will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Block

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This quilt is so soft and I already washed it and it washed very well! The color is great and it is very good quality! I always buy a King size even though I have a Queen size bed just to make sure it fits but I could have bought a Queen and it would have fit just fine. I do like it a little bigger so I'm not complaining! I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: susan wooster

customer_reviews.title: Hang dry!
customer_reviews.text: 4 score because after washing and drying, there is fuzz coming from the material. I use a lint brush, but it continues to come out. The color did not fade at all. Only issue is the small amounts of cotton which is visible.
customer_reviews.author: ms keyes

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Initially purchased this quilt set for the guest bedroom. I wanted something that would be lightweight but also soft and comfortable. This absolutely met my needs. It is soft, I was able to layer blankets without the bed looking too bulky. There was no off putting smell when coming out the package. I've washed it twice and put in the dryer on a low heat setting and have had no problems. It is a product I recommend and would absolutely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a summer quilt. Super light but still keeps you warm. The tag says not to tumble dry but I did anyway and it turned out just fine (the color didn't fade and there weren't any clumps or shrinkage), I just made sure to set the dryer on the lowest setting and took it out when it was damp-ish to finish drying flat. Worked out great! For the price, why not? I say go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Destinee

customer_reviews.title: This is not microfiber as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this purchase because the description said microfiber. I did not want a polyester bedspread which by the way, I could have purchased from another supplier for US20.00. I chose to purchase this one for the better quality, softer material. Very disappointed with this supplier. When you advertise a material you need to supply same.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Y.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality blanket. It's a tad warmer than I'd like during the summer here in Texas, but that's what an AC is for. I liked it so much I bought a second one in navy. They are a little on the heavy side to. I like to not have covers on my feet or have the blanket/sheets tucked in at the bottom. To get my feet out is a bit of a tussle so that's what I mean by heavy. It's not uncomfortable by any means, just a struggle to get my feet out. That could be more to do with me than the blanket though. 😉 I would most definitely recommend this blanket. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The “quilt” is a thin as a sheet. The bedding is fine if you wanted something for looks but if you want something for warmth, this isn’t the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: obsess with it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for white bed sheets for so long and try so many brands and couldn’t find that I will be happy with.. one day I was looking thought Instagram and found this girl @ukrainianlilyhome.com, she was recommending it and I order right away, thank you to her, I’m obsesses with it, it’s so comfortable and looks amazing on the bed. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nadya S

customer_reviews.title: Super soft but very thin
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, use it as the blanket near skin cuz feels great. Way thinner than expected but seems very warm with our comforter. Nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: 1CrazyLife4Me

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking quilt. As with most quilts, this is pretty thin, and I needed a second blanket under it (as I anticipated). The stitching design did seem to have a few inconsistencies and loose threads; hopefully they will last through years of wear and washing. If so, I will be very pleased with the purchase--as I am thus far.
customer_reviews.author: kp7800

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, but Ivory is very Yellowish
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product for the price, it isn't as nice as a $100 quilt but that makes sense because it is much cheaper. However just beware that the ivory is very yellowish. My room is a lot of gray, black, and some white so the fact that it has a yellowness to it really stands out. Otherwise it is perfect for a standalone summer quilt or added weight and warmth for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: Item barely fit a full size bed much less a queen. There was something seen in between the layers in the "quilting" that sounded like plastic every time the quilt moved. The slick microfiber material made it impossible to keep on the bed. Very disappointing quality and it was returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Microfiber is hot!
customer_reviews.text: This king microfiber quilt arrived shoved into its packaging. Presentation is everything people! The quilt is lightweight as described and is a good back-up but certainly not one to be used in master bedroom suite. The white is VERY white, almost with a blue hue. I will keep it as a back up but did purchase a higher quality set for the master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: T P.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, so soft, and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: This far exceeded my expectations. It is extremely soft, light weight, and perfect for my son's queen size bed. So far every other thing we've put on his bed hasn't been big enough, but this fits nicely. He loves it, I love, and I just ordered two more in a twin size for my twins room. Great product for a very fair and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: allboys

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight for summer use, good workmanship, and the price was reasonable. (The two accent pillows I ordered elsewhere were double the price!).
customer_reviews.author: Anne G. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, the customer service was great, but had I known how cheap it was I wouldn't have bought it. It is a product that is used for a short while before ending up in a landfill forever. If you don't mind reinforcing the edges, then this is a cheap purchase that requires some work in order for it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Andypie

customer_reviews.title: Not  a heavy quilt
customer_reviews.text: This quilt served my purpose very well. I was not looking for a heavy winter quilt, but something light weight for summer. This is the right weight and is pretty as well. Looks good on my bed. I am very pleased..Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DC Granny

customer_reviews.title: Going to but more
customer_reviews.text: Love the price for a king size. I immediately washed it and put it on my be. We have a queen and my other bedspread was too short on the sides do when we went to bed there was nothing there. Now we have plenty of coverage. Im going to buy another one or two because I love 💘 it do much.
customer_reviews.author: harley69d

customer_reviews.title: VERY thin, but true to color and stitching is well done
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the stitching! However, I guess I didnt read the product description well enough to know just how lightweight this was going to be. Growing up, when I had a quilt, it was hand stitched by my grandmother or great-grandmother, thicker than a fleece blanket but thinner than a comforter, and softer than a baby's bottom. Dont get me wrong, I like it, and its held up decently well for every day use in the wintertime, it's just not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, true white, snag free, durable, soft
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Light weight, true white, flexible, soft, durable material, and snag free. A great summertime quilt. I use this with a top sheet and it’s perfect for summer heat because it’s so light. (100F outside). I will definitely need to put another blanket under in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F

customer_reviews.title: BETTER then even described
customer_reviews.text: My winter quilt was so heavy so I thought I would get something light weight. It is light weight but enough weight when you get chilled in the middle of a summer nights sleep. I love it so much, I talked about it so much at work and 2 co-workers bought it and they too love it. I'm considering getting it in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this quilt set! Washed and dries perfect since it’s not thick. Comforters in the past I would have to keep running the dryer but this only takes one time. It’s light enough that you don’t sweat it you’re a hot sleeper but thick enough to keep warm. My husband gets hot and I don’t and it’s just perfect. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Dyess

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Really liked how this blanket feels for the guest room
customer_reviews.author: Markes

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this quilt. The stitching adds great detail and it is well made. It washed well on the gentle cycle. Although I use it for a top quilt and don’t actually sleep with it, it is very soft and light weight. It would make a great summer quilt or it would also be great for those that stay hot. The accompanying pillow shams are great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I am a hot sleeper and really needed something light, even for the winter time. This blanket has been perfect and was at a great price point for a king size. The material has held up very well so far. I layered a thin bamboo blanket underneath and have slept happily ever since.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get through the Texas summer. Its light weight but its warm. I bought the used version so some stitching was a little messed up. It fits my pillowtop queen really well so that you cant see the mattress sides. My dog has gotten muddy paw prints on it 2 or 3 times and its gone through the wash and dry cycle with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Krh10

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value
customer_reviews.text: We needed an inexpensive quilt for our guest bedroom and are thrilled with this; the price was so low we worried about the quality, but the quality is wonderful. Looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Susan F

customer_reviews.title: The right item for us
customer_reviews.text: We needed a bed cover that was not as huge as our normal comforter. The comforter had to be cleaned at the laundry mat every week (we have dogs) this one fits in our large capacity front loader washer. Holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kennym

customer_reviews.title: Great designs and color options
customer_reviews.text: Good stitch wok. Washes and dries great. And there are fabulous color and design options. The quilt covered the bed completely with a generous over the side hanging. Only downside is would have preferred a warmer blanket suitable for cold winters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pattern and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been loving this lightweight quilt set for the past several months. It’s perfect for the hot summer and has been warm enough for the start of fall. The pattern is beautiful and has held up excellently with several washes and being thrown in the dryer. I’d purchase this set again & would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: This quilt is super soft and tons of over hang for our King size bed. Put this in the wash as soon as we got it and it help up perfectly. We purchased the Dark grey and the color was just like the picture. We love it and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: cari king

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my son's room. I like quilts because they are typically heavy enough that their weight gives them a nice smooth, neat appearance. This set however, is very thin and does not resemble a quilt. I should ha e paided more attention before ordering. My son is special needs and I thought this would be a comforter that would look great without much effort but you can only do so much with something lightweight and somewhat cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't for me
customer_reviews.text: I thought it looked better in the picture than in person. It was darker than I thought it would be and didn't work in the room intended. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and comfortable!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase! Was looking for a lightweight cover for my bed and was worried that this wouldn't be soft enough but I was pleasantly surprised at how comfortable it is. It's been through the washer and dryer about 10 times now and it's still holding up wonderfully! My last king comforter fit more like a queen so I was so happy to find this one is a perfect length and hangs low enough to cover my mattress and bedspring on both sides!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal103002

customer_reviews.title: VERY lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and pattern! It is a little more light weight than I thought, but perfect for summer! During the winter months, I’ll need to put another blanket with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUILT
customer_reviews.text: This quilt is finally what I was looking for!! It is the right weight, it's soft and it doesn't fall off the bed! And the BEST part, it fit's our King size bed, with extra to hang over the sides, so the sheets don't show!! Recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect some beautifully woven quilt from your great gran. If you're looking for a simple quilt that covers you, but you don't want to sweat, this is perfect. It's almost TOO cool for us sometimes, and we'll definitely have to switch to something warmer in the winter, but for now it's pretty great - and our dogs don't try to chew the fluff out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Page Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bedspread for the price. It is light weight and the color us perfect. I went with a larger size because I like my comforter to touch the floor on both sides and foot if the bed. The style is easily changed with the season with different color throw pillows and curtains to complement the comforter. I went with a taupe and copper for the winter months and white for the summer and both are beautiful mixed with this color. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was lightweight and we plan to use it with a down comforter in winter and just with a sheet during summer. We had an expensive comforter set on our bed previously that did not hold up well and have replaced it with this. Inexpensive but looks and feels great. I'm very please. The quilt is huge and covers my bed nicely, even with a down comforter underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: light enough for summer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for summer night! its so light. wish they have more variety color options. I ordered gray thinking that its like a Charcoal grey, but it was a little lighter color than i expected, but i still like the quality. worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LEAHJASKINH

customer_reviews.title: Definitely for hot sleepers!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid amazon shopper, and this is my very first review just because I love this comforter! I am always hot at night! My boyfriend is always cold... Though the down comforter we used to use feels like heaven and is oh so soft, an hour in I would wake up sweating like crazy. This one isn’t as soft as others, it definitely is the best for those of us who sleep hot! Get it and you won’t regret - I haven’t woken up in the middle of the night to adjust the thermostat since I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: I found it very comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the value- it was well made- nice and light. My only complaint is I would of liked to have seen a few more color options. I was looking for a Forest or dark green but it seemed nobody offered this color.
customer_reviews.author: Ironland

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, good value.
customer_reviews.text: It is really attractive, the basket weave pattern is elegant, it's pretty matt (not shiny) which I like. Very lightweight. I ordered the King size because my Queen sized bed is high, but I think it would have been the right size even if my bed were lower.
customer_reviews.author: Prufrock

customer_reviews.title: Runs small for a king
customer_reviews.text: Seems to run on the smaller side for a king.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Soft set with irregular pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: We order sheets from this brand often. My last order was sheets in lavender and this set. The sheets were soiled and this set was irregular. The pillow cases were poorly stitched and are defective due to ruching and puckering. This all got worse in the wash. Both items aren’t wrinkle resistant like previous sheet sets. They are super soft and dry quickly. I recommend this brand. I hope they resolve our request for replacement sets soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bloom Havlin

customer_reviews.title: Great summer comforter!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome summer comforter! Switched out my winter set for this one and wanted something that was perfect for summer weather, not too thick, not too thin, and this fit the bill. My husband and I love it and want them in several colors!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable luxury
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Pink soft color, not bright. Looking luxurious. Simple and gorge. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lightweight quilt that was stitched and not embossed and had a surprisingly hard time finding one. I took a chance on this one because of the great price. I"m really pleased with it so far! I washed and dried the quilt before use and it looked great coming out of the dryer. It's the perfect size for a queen bed and is very soft. I'll buy another for the guest rooon!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Very satisfied with this purchase. The dark grey is a bit too dark for me, but very nice color nevertheless. I would buy again in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, lightweight, LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: This quilt is amazing! I received it quickly, even in the midst of a health pandemic. The color is a rich, deep navy. Washing instructions were sent via email which was unexpected and appreciated! I washed the quilt before putting it on the bed and the rich navy color remained. The quilt is lightweight and well made.
customer_reviews.author: annie_cack

customer_reviews.title: Very Cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit on the bead and the lightweight feel but still provides warmth. The colors are amazing and I will be getting a couple more. I don't feel too warm or cold and it sleeps very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Plooy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter’s First big girl bed. It’s lightweight enough that’s she’s not too hot in the summer. The material is very soft and the size is perfect. The pink is kind of muted but it’s very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quilt for summertime
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this quilt! I like the feel of a quilt opposed to a comforter, but our other one was too heavy for summer In the south! This is perfect. Lightweight, pretty stitching, Rich color. Would recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jf

customer_reviews.title: Soft lightweight quilt set
customer_reviews.text: This is a soft and very lightweight quilt and shams. I purchased to use in RV. Descent quilt set for the low price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase, gave to my mom as a gift she loves it, soft material not heavy like most bed spreads . Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Agie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quilt
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quilt! Exactly as expected and great value for the money! They also sent a separate email with detailed care instructions. I am very impressed and would buy (probably will buy) another quilt from these guys. If you’re on the fence, no need to worry this quilt is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love this quilt.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a king size and fits perfectly. It’s actually bigger than expected, but I love that because it covers my entire bed and is long enough on the sides. It’s a bit more white than an ivory, but I love it. Besides a few longer strings that I needed to cut off it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ESTEPHANIE PENALOZA

customer_reviews.title: Good size but not very warm
customer_reviews.text: It’s large and the color is as pictured. But it’s extremely light and not very warm. It’s not very soft. It’s great for going over a comforter or for a hot winter night.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Conway

customer_reviews.title: Best Cover ever for people who sleep hot.
customer_reviews.text: I sleep VERY HOT, but prefer a cover with a little weight. This is perfect. I don't use a sheet, just this cover and am very comfortable. Ordered twin size for my side of the bed as hubby sleeps under two heavy comforters even in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Ephrath

customer_reviews.title: Incredible deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable, nice looking quilt. Not too heavy nor too light, it's a Goldilocks. I am very surprised of the quality at the price as well. I doubt I could find a better deal on par with the quality elsewhere. I plan on sticking to the care instructions provided to maintain a long life of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Def recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this comforter set!! Just as described. High quality, light weight. My husband even commented on the quality vs. the price! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: savannah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! I order this product and it came in the next day! Very soft and great quality for the price. Color is also beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Blanket - got the blue one...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly how it is in the picture. Got this as a gift. I thought it would be a bit thicker. It is very light and thin. It still works. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Taylor,Brenda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quilt .
customer_reviews.text: Sick of comforters filling moving around . No duvet , twice the work . Quilt is the answer . I have a queen bed , got the king quilt and looks great . Measure and try .
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy
customer_reviews.text: For the college student that doesnt use a comforter. He likes it. Thin easy to make and looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Machelle Ford Ferry

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice
customer_reviews.text: It's very light weight, haven't washed it yet but I hope I can was it in my regular washing machine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that they are light weight and love the color. In the south, we need something light for the summer. I have a throw blanket at the foot of the bed if more cover is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dee D.

customer_reviews.title: Smart Looking
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it another star if my cat didn't put a little rip in it. Still like it and would buy another like it next time.
customer_reviews.author: ab

customer_reviews.title: Great for warm springs and summers
customer_reviews.text: Probably still too heavy for some climates, but for the Northwest, this is a perfect balance for Spring and Summer.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is the color ivory , super nice for $31. On daily deal when I spotted this. The pattern is nice. No loose threads. Well enough to cover 1/2 of the bo spring or tuck in. Super deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sue C

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight blanket
customer_reviews.text: It was not as thick as I originally thought, but it it very warm and a geat alternative to big fluffy blankets. I'm actually very pleased with it, soft not heavy but still warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jahejema

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Warmer months
customer_reviews.text: This quilt is perfect for summer months. It's soft and light weight. Beautiful and I love the pattern.
customer_reviews.author: JL Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this quilt. It’s been washed several times and the color has not faded and it is still holding up. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, soft, and cozy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hoping it would be cooler than my all-season comforter because I am a hot sleeper. I’ve had this on for just one night but already it’s a major improvement! Pretty design, great color, and feels soft and cozy yet not too warm. The shams are great too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Haywood

product_meta.title: Bedsure Quilt Set Grey Full/Queen Size (90x96 inches) - Basket Weave Pattern Bedspread - Soft Microfiber Lightweight Coverlet for All Season - 3 Pieces (Includes 1 Quilt, 2 Shams)
feature_bullets: OUTSTANDING FEATURES: Year-round chic for the bed, Bedsure Quilt Sets with basket-weave stitching lend sumptuous texture and subtle sophistication to your bed - Tight stitching or seams on the edging will hold up through washing and won't unravel for longer years to use - Lightweight, durable bedspread sets are perfect for family with pets or kids.

SIZES & MEASUREMENTS: Full/Queen size (90"x96") 3 piece quilt set comes with a quilt and two shams (20"x26") - If you need a quilt that drapes all the way to the floor, you may have a low bed or choose a larger size - If you have a deep pillow top mattress (that sits up high on a bed frame and box spring), you'll need a bed skirt to cover the sides well.

MULTI-PURPOSE USAGE: Perfect coverlet quilt for summer or warmer weather, you can layer it with a blanket/sheet underneath - In the winter, you can add a comforter underneath - Using a quilt solo on your bed in your master room, guest room or vacation homes - If you have night sweats or toss and turn a lot, it is easy to move freely with this coverlet.

HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: Woven of 100% microfiber cover and filling, this quilt set is soft & "cottony" and will soften after washing - High quality material features fade, shrink, pilling and stains resistant which will last for all year round - Easy to clean (NO Dog's hairs left), machine wash cold and dry quickly (you may follow the care instructions).
WHAT YOU CAN GET: Bedsure 3 Piece Reversible Quilt Set Full/Queen Size - Solid Stitched Pattern - Soft Microfiber Lightweight Coverlet Bedspread for All Season - Grey (Includes 1 quilt, 2 shams) .
